name: solana-transactions-executor
description: A small solution to operate solana transactions: create, sign, send, chunk, support ledger etc.

scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid beta && yarn build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && yarn build && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && yarn build && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && yarn build && npm publish

author: Vladislav Sablevsky <sablevsky@gmail.com>
